text: Japan Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (JSIAM) is a Japanese non-profit organization for the field of applied mathematics. JSIAM is not a branch but a Japanese counterpart of the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) based in the United States. ==Activities== As same as SIAM, JSIAM publishes academic journals in Japanese and English, hold academic conferences,The main language is Japanese, but non-Japanese speakers are allowed to submit their talk abstract and give their presentation in English. and give awards to applied mathematicians with JSIAM membership. ===English Journals and Publications from JSIAM=== * SIAM Online Magazine * JJIAM (Japan Journal of Industrial and Applied Mathematics)Japan Journal of Industrial and Applied Mathematics, SpringerLink * JSIAM Letters ==Related pages== * Japan Society for the Promotion of Science * Japan Society for Simulation Technology * Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics * EASIAM ==Notes== Category:Applied mathematics Category:1990 establishments in Japan Category:Mathematical societies Category:Scientific organizations based in Japan
title: Japan Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
